articles.title: 亚马逊推出AI实时扫描购物功能_手机网易网
articles.author: 鞭牛士
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, an AI-powered real-time scanning feature integrated into its shopping app. This feature enables users to scan real-world objects with their phone's camera and instantly find matching products within Amazon's inventory, providing a seamless 'what you see is what you get' shopping experience.

articles.title: Baobab+ rebrands to Izili, boosts renewable energy distribution
articles.author: Dare Olawin
articles.summary: Baobab + has rebranded to Izili, signaling a renewed focus on delivering affordable solar power and digital connectivity to underserved communities across Africa following BioLite's acquisition of a majority stake. Izili aims to deepen its reach in Senegal, Ivory Coast, Madagascar, and Nigeria, ensuring clean energy and digital tools are accessible through its last-mile network.

articles.title: Spotto launches in ANZ to optimise cloud costs for SaaS firms
articles.summary: Spotto has launched in Australia and New Zealand. The AI-powered service aims to cut Microsoft Azure cloud costs. It also intends to boost SaaS firms' margins and MSP services.

articles.title: Get 30% off and a free gift with Thrive Market grocery delivery
articles.author: Kasey Caminiti
articles.summary: Thrive Market, a grocery delivery service specializing in organic and clean products, is offering new users a 30% discount on their first order and a free gift worth up to $60.  The service provides a membership-based marketplace with over 5,000 products from organic, sustainable, and ethical brands, offering scheduled grocery deliveries.

articles.title: 'Hug your kids': JD and Usha Vance visit Minneapolis after Annunciation Church shooting
articles.summary: WeAreIowa offers the WeAreIowa app. Users can stream WeAreIowa content on their phones using the app.

articles.title: Rudi's, Hormel unveil gluten-free PB&J sandwiches
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: Rudi's has added a new product to its Sandos product line.

articles.title: Hillshire Farms launches new lunch meat products
articles.author: Food Business News
articles.summary: A company introduces three new flavor profiles targeting retail customers as part of their new product offerings.

articles.title: New AI model turns photos into explorable 3D worlds, with caveats
articles.summary: Tencent has released HunyuanWorld-Voyager, an open-weights AI model. The model generates 3D-consistent video sequences from a single image and can be used to explore virtual scenes by piloting a camera path.

articles.title: I tested ReMarkable's 7-inch E Ink tablet, and it solved a problem I didn't know ...
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: A company has released a new premium digital paper tablet. The tablet offers a satisfying writing experience in a compact, nearly pocket-sized form factor.

articles.title: Is Nivea's $10 face cream better than La Mer's $390 moisturizer? I found out
articles.author: Lucy Partington
articles.summary: The article compares Nivea Creme and La Mer's cream, examining their ingredients, performance, and overall value.  While La Mer emphasizes its 'miracle broth,' both creams effectively moisturize, but Nivea is presented as a significantly more affordable alternative.  The decision depends on personal preference, with La Mer justifying its price through luxurious packaging and potentially long-term cumulative effects.

articles.title: New car wash now open in Allendale
articles.author: Madalyn Buursma
articles.summary: Tommy's Express has launched a new car wash location in Allendale Township, Michigan, at 5380 Lake Michigan Drive. The new location offers free car washes through Friday, Sept. 5 and includes free floor mat washers and vacuum stations. The car wash is designed with sustainability and customer experience in mind, featuring recycled materials and a modern environment.

articles.title: Athleticism meets artistry in Shai Gilgeous-Alexander's first signature shoe dropping tomorrow
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: Converse is launching the SHAI 001 Butter, a new signature basketball shoe designed in collaboration with NBA MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander. The shoe features a puffed, molded upper, a Nike Air Zoom unit in the forefoot, and Shai's logo on the padded tongue, and will be available on September 4th for $130.

articles.title: Review: Arctis Nova 3P Wireless is a budget headset with no-frills value
articles.author: Gieson Cacho
articles.summary: SteelSeries has launched the Arctis Nova 3P wireless headset, a more affordable audio product priced at $109.99. The Nova 3P features a lightweight design, 40-hour battery life with fast charging, and compatibility with PlayStation, PC, Mac, and Nintendo Switch 2 (via firmware update). It works with SteelSeries Arctis Companion App and SteelSeries GG program.

articles.title: Stanhope, NJ Embraces SSD Glass' Expert Glass Designs
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SSD Glass, a glass company in Northwest New Jersey, is offering custom shower doors as part of the latest bathroom trend. The company is known for its creative craftsmanship.

articles.title: Google brings material 3 expressive on pixel devices
articles.summary: Google is launching AI-driven updates across its Pixel devices and Android ecosystem. The updates include Material You design improvements, Adaptive Audio for Pixel Buds Pro 2, and AI-powered writing tools for Gboard. Additionally, Pixel Watch and Quick Share receive enhancements, and the Androidify feature is back.

articles.title: Bruvi's single-serve coffee bundle in black is currently under $200 on Amazon
articles.author: Amanda Edelman
articles.summary: Bruvi's single-serve coffee maker, the Bruvi Bundle in Black, is currently discounted on Amazon. The bundle includes the coffee maker and a variety pack of 20 B-pods, Bruvi's own line of one-use coffee pods. The iPhone-compatible Bruvi app allows remote operation and B-pod reordering.

articles.title: Third Eye Fragrance Co. Breaks into the Perfume Market with Launch of Its Bold and ...
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Third Eye Fragrance Co. has launched its debut scent, "Red Rum," entering the niche perfumery market.

articles.title: Stanhope, NJ Embraces SSD Glass' Expert Glass Designs
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: SSD Glass is introducing custom shower doors in Northwest New Jersey, offering frameless enclosures and patterned glass. The company aims to transform bathrooms into personalized, spa-like retreats. They also craft custom mirrors, railings, and office partitions for residential and commercial projects.

articles.title: Managed AI Services Are Here, Thrive's Bold Move Proves It
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Thrive is pivoting to managed AI, offering a new service aimed at delivering specific outcomes for companies. This shift signifies a move towards a service-led approach for enterprise AI, focusing on tangible results rather than just providing AI tools.

articles.title: Larry's Catch Now Expands Coast to Coast, Bringing Premium Canadian Seafood to All with Its Canada-Wide Delivery Service
articles.summary: Larry's Catch, a seafood delivery service, is now delivering Canada-wide. The service offers wild-caught, flash-frozen Canadian seafood sourced from certified-sustainable family fisheries. Customers can choose from curated boxes or build custom orders and select a delivery frequency.

articles.title: Viva Unveils Winner of Viva Brand Ambassador Challenge To Reward Customer Loyalty and Creativity.
articles.author: Sponsored Post
articles.summary: Viva, a brand from Aspira Nigeria Limited, launched an ambassador challenge to promote its Viva Plus Detergent and Viva Dishwashing Liquid. Hafsat Halliru Ismail emerged as the winner, securing a ₦5 million ambassadorial deal to be featured in brand engagements. The initiative emphasizes customer-driven innovation and shared brand ownership.

articles.title: Google brings back Androidify bot maker with ‘AI at its core'
articles.summary: Google is releasing its new AI-powered Androidify app and website to the public after a preview at I/O 2025.

articles.title: Coterie Skincare Launch 2025
articles.author: Alicia Betz
articles.summary: Coterie has launched a new baby skincare line featuring First Wash, Soft Cream, and Bun Balm, designed to be gentle and prevent skin issues for sensitive and eczema-prone baby skin. The products are vegan, petroleum-free, and carry the National Eczema Association's Seal of Acceptance, and are currently available exclusively at Coterie.

articles.title: Sentiment Analysis For Social Media Monitoring Tool 2025 - BrandMentions Launches Entity-Level Sentiment Scoring for Top Social Listening Platform
articles.author: Brand Mentions
articles.summary: BrandMentions launched advanced brand-level sentiment and emotion analysis, which combines per-entity sentiment scoring, sarcasm detection, and emotion tagging. This new system analyzes sentiment for every brand, product, hashtag, or person mentioned, providing detailed insights and actionable intelligence compared to traditional methods. The technology is trained on real-world social language, giving BrandMentions a competitive edge in recognizing sarcasm, slang, emojis, and abbreviations.

articles.title: Made in Mexico: Jabón Zote
articles.author: María Meléndez
articles.summary: La Corona expanded into detergents in 1954, launching a new product line based on petrochemical derivatives. In the 1970s, La Corona acquired Zote soap, reimagined it with perfume and quality ingredients, and marketed it as both laundry and bath soap, leading to a sensation. In 1972, La Corona introduced 1-2-3 cooking oil.

articles.title: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 ruined other foldables for me—including mine
articles.author: Jared Newman
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy Z Fold7 is a new foldable phone featuring a 6.5-inch outer screen. The Fold7 is thinner and lighter than previous models like the Fold6 and is comparable in size to the iPhone 16 Pro Max, making it feel like a regular phone. The phone improves upon earlier models with its enhanced design.

articles.title: How to get your Aldi immersion blender at the Jersey Shore, and three other hot finds
articles.summary: Aldi has launched the Ambiano-branded 3-in-1 immersion hand blender for $14.99, offering a budget-friendly alternative to Cuisinart models. The Ambiano blender includes a chopping bowl and whisk attachment and features a 500W motor, surpassing Cuisinart's 300W version in power. The product was released on Wednesday, Sept. 3 and available until stock lasts.

articles.title: Sheetz Of Charlotte Hall Will Host Grand Opening On Sept. 11
articles.author: Carrie Cabral
articles.summary: Sheetz opened a new store, No. 896, at 37692 John Knight Drive in Charlotte Hall, Maryland. The store operates 24 hours and celebrated its grand opening on September 11th with giveaways, including a chance to win free Sheetz for a year. The event featured a ribbon-cutting ceremony and Z-Card giveaways.

articles.title: Nike's ‘Comfortable and Stylish' Retro Shoes Are Now Just $48
articles.author: Kelsey Mccarson
articles.summary: Nike is selling Nike Waffle Debut Men's Shoes for $48, which is 40% off the original price. The shoes combine a retro look with modern comfort features, including a plush midsole and waffle outsole. Buyers rate the Nike sneakers 4.6 stars out of five.

articles.title: Top 10 lightning offers on washing machines for huge savings and smart wash from Samsung, LG and others
articles.summary: Several companies are launching new washing machine models with advanced features. LG introduces a 9 Kg front load washing machine with AI Direct Drive and Hygiene Steam. Samsung launches an 8 Kg top load washing machine featuring AI Wash and Ecobubble technology. Haier offers a 10.5 Kg top load washing machine with an inbuilt butterfly heater and Oceanus Wave Drum, while Panasonic presents an 8 Kg top load smart washing machine with Wi-Fi connectivity and AI-powered wash. Godrej features an 8 Kg top load washing machine with Zero Pressure Technology, and IFB introduces 7.5 Kg top load and 6.5 Kg front load washing machines with AI-powered fabric sensing and 9 Swirl Wash technology. Bosch offers 9 Kg and 10 Kg front load washing machines with AI Active Water Plus.

articles.title: HubSpot Introduces the Loop: A New Playbook for Growth in the AI Era
articles.author: Hastings Tribune
articles.summary: HubSpot has introduced Loop Marketing, a new approach with four stages (Express, Tailor, Amplify, Evolve). This service aims to help brands adapt to AI-driven search changes and address zero-click searches.

articles.title: My favorite Ninja Flip Toaster Oven & Air Fryer is 32% off today
articles.author: Emma Sutton-Williams
articles.summary: The Ninja Flip Toaster Oven & Air Fryer offers 8-in-1 functionality, including air frying, roasting, and baking. It utilizes OvenCrisp Technology for faster and more even cooking, and it is designed to be space-saving and energy-efficient, preheating in under a minute and consuming less energy than a standard oven.

articles.title: Ninja Swirl review: I made perfect Mr Whippy ice cream at home
articles.author: Holly Gonsalves
articles.summary: Ninja launched the Ninja Swirl, a new at-home ice cream maker with a unique soft serve function, priced at £349.99. The Ninja Swirl combines the original CREAMi ice cream maker with a soft serve function. It is available at major retailers such as Ninja, Currys, John Lewis, AO and Very.

articles.title: I tried the UK's most expensive lube — the £70 bottle transformed my sex life
articles.author: Alice Giddings
articles.summary: Ples'Jour has introduced Opal lube, a premium lubricant priced significantly higher than standard brands like Durex. The product promises a long-lasting, silky formula that enhances every touch, providing constant moisture and eliminating discomfort during sex. It is fragrance-free and safe to use with latex or polyisoprene condoms.

articles.title: This Shark Vacuum Is So Good, It Will 'Make You Wonder' How Clean Your Home Really Is
articles.author: Kevin Cortez
articles.summary: The Shark PowerPro Plus, a lightweight cordless stick vacuum, is receiving high praise for its powerful suction, no-tangle brush head, and ease of use. Customers are impressed by its ability to pick up dirt, pet hair, and dust, with some even preferring it over Dyson models. It is currently on sale on Amazon.

articles.title: Samsung launches Bespoke AI washer dryer range in India, price starts at Rs 63,990
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Samsung India has launched its new Bespoke AI Washer Dryer range in India, a high-capacity all-in-one laundry solution with advanced AI features. Priced from ₹63,990, the range offers features like AI Wash, Auto Dispense, and AI Control, aiming for faster, smarter, and more sustainable laundry. The Bespoke AI Washer Dryer range is available across Samsung.com, e-commerce platforms, and retail outlets.

articles.title: How to get your Aldi immersion blender in NJ, and three other hot finds
articles.author: Damon C. Williams
articles.summary: Aldi has launched its Ambiano-branded 3-in-1 immersion hand blender for $14.99. The blender comes with a chopping bowl and whisk attachment and boasts a 500W motor, which is more powerful than Cuisinart's version. It was released on September 3rd and will be available while supplies last.

articles.title: 5 ChatGPT Prompts To Future-Proof Your Business And Build An Empire
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: ChatGPT prompts are presented as a transformative business solution for predicting disruptions, revealing customer needs, and automating operations. These prompts aim to future-proof business strategies.

articles.title: JBL Released a Portable Bluetooth Speaker Modeled After a Seltzer Can
articles.author: Matt Jancer
articles.summary: JBL is launching the Grip, a portable Bluetooth speaker with a cylindrical design resembling an energy drink can. The Grip features IP68 dust and water resistance and will be available in six colors for $100, with pre-orders open now and a full launch on September 28.

articles.title: British businessman Alan Sugar celebrates 39 years of the world's first affordable IBM-compatible PC whose sub-$500 pricing 'left everyone amazed'
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: In 1986, Alan Sugar launched the Amstrad PC1512, an affordable IBM-compatible PC, priced at £399. Amstrad's PC1512 targeted households and small businesses, offering professional-grade performance with features like a 20MB hard drive and bundled software, and ultimately selling over half a million units across Europe.

articles.title: LambdaTest Integrates with Appcircle to Enhance Mobile CI/CD Testing Workflows
articles.author: Globe Newswire
articles.summary: LambdaTest and Appcircle have partnered to integrate automated testing into mobile CI/CD pipelines. Appcircle users can now utilize the LambdaTest App Automate - Espresso step for automated Android tests within their CI/CD workflows, streamlining infrastructure management and accelerating release cycles.

articles.title: Reviewers Say This Queen-Sized Mattress Is a "Game-Changer for Back Pain"
articles.author: Lauryn Jiles
articles.summary: Novilla is offering its Queen-Sized Mattress on Amazon with a 44% discount, bringing the price down to under $130. The 12-inch medium-firm mattress features a breathable knit fabric cover, moisture-wicking fabric, soft foam, pocket springs, and enhanced edge support. Customers are praising its comfort and back pain relief.

articles.title: Newsweek New & Noteworthy: Products You Need to Try (Sep 3, 2025)
articles.author: Adam Mills
articles.summary: Several companies have launched new products. Bulletproof is re-releasing its Pumpkin Spice Enhanced Creamer for a limited time. TAST!EZ has launched five new snack bites. Oikos has released a new Fusion drink packed with protein and fiber. Campbell's Chunky has collaborated with Pabst Blue Ribbon to launch Chunky x PBR Soups in two flavors. Cetaphil is launching a Nourishing Oil to Foam Cleanser. RXBAR is introducing a High Protein bar. Garden of Life offers Sprouted Barley Protein + Probiotics. DOLE launched new Fruit Snacks, and Philips Norelco has announced Head Shaver Pro Series.

articles.title: Bucks Fans Share Their Season Expectations for the 2025-26 Season and the NBA's Next Big Problem?
articles.summary: KENS 5 provides a streaming service accessible on phones. Users need the KENS 5 app to stream the content.

articles.title: Goldcast Unveils Agentic AI Vision for Marketers at AI Marketing School
articles.summary: Goldcast unveiled its agentic AI vision and announced the beta availability of its first agentic solutions at AI Marketing School. The initial agents aim to reduce manual work, accelerate speed to market, and scale video and event impact. Marketers are invited to join the beta waitlist for early access and shape the roadmap of future agents.

articles.title: Why this Bosch screwdriver is my new all-time favorite tool (and it charges with USB-C)
articles.author: Adrian Kingsley-Hughes
articles.summary: Bosch's GO 3 cordless screwdriver is available for \$79.90 at Amazon. The screwdriver features fast charging and a large battery and has held up to heavy use for over six months. It is a follow-up to an earlier model.

articles.title: Haut.AI Collaborates with Neutrogena® on The Refresh of Iconic Neutrogena Skin360® with Advanced AI-Driven Skin Analysis Technology
articles.author: Haut.AI
articles.summary: Haut.AI collaborates with Neutrogena to refresh the Skin360 experience. The updated experience uses Haut.AI's AI skin analysis to provide personalized skincare recommendations based on real-time insights. Users can find suitable Neutrogena products using the refreshed Skin360.

articles.title: Rinse Launches in Toronto, Marking First International Expansion
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Rinse, a laundry and dry cleaning delivery service, has launched in Toronto, marking its first international expansion. Toronto residents now have access to Wash & Fold, Dry Cleaning, Hang Dry, and Rinse Repeat services through Rinse's website or mobile app. The expansion follows Rinse's $23 million Series D funding round, led by LG Electronics.

articles.title: Samsung launches Bespoke AI washer dryer range in India, price starts at Rs 63,990
articles.author: The Times
articles.summary: Samsung India has launched its new Bespoke AI Washer Dryer range, an all-in-one laundry solution with a 12kg wash/7kg dry capacity. The lineup, designed for modern Indian households, integrates advanced AI features and is priced from ₹63,990.

articles.title: Rinse Launches in Toronto, Marking First International Expansion
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Rinse, a laundry and dry cleaning delivery service, launched in Toronto. This launch marks the company's first international expansion.

articles.title: I tested ReMarkable's new 7-inch tablet, and it unlocked an all new way to work
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: A company has launched a premium digital paper tablet. The new tablet offers the same satisfying writing experience as previous models but in a compact, nearly pocket-sized form factor.

articles.title: Angelo's West is spicing up Pueblo West's to-go options for pizza and Italian food
articles.author: The Pueblo Chieftain
articles.summary: Angelo's West, a new location of Angelo's pizza, opened in Pueblo West on July 28, offering residents a new pick-up and delivery option. It features the same owners, recipes, ingredients, and traditional style as the Angelo's on the Riverwalk in Pueblo.

articles.title: Benchmark Gensuite's ANVL Mobilize Named 2025 OH&S New EHS Product of the Year
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Benchmark Gensuite's ANVL Mobilize™ has been named the 2025 Occupational Health & Safety (OH&S) New Product of the Year in the EHS Apps category. This recognition follows Benchmark Gensuite's 2024 win for its Genny AI solutions, marking consecutive years of honors for the company's product innovations.

articles.title: 谷歌nano banana官方最强Prompt模板来了！先收藏再说
articles.author: 创事记
org: 谷歌为了帮助大家快速上手，亲自下场为我们带来了
articles.summary: Google is introducing Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (nano banana), an AI model that generates images based on text prompts. It provides six prompt templates covering realistic photography, stickers, text rendering, product photography, minimalist design, and comics to help users quickly get started with image generation. The article also provides code samples using Google's API.

articles.title: Download and install on Windows
articles.author: Marina Collins
articles.summary: Sortaroo, an application that offers a visual approach to file organization using tags and colors, has launched on the Microsoft Store. It allows users to categorize files efficiently, aiming to boost productivity by providing a streamlined experience for managing digital files and documents. The app is designed to help users quickly locate files through an intuitive, customizable interface.

articles.title: Dyson fans say new Airwrap leaves hair 'beautiful, healthy and damage-free'
articles.author: Lauren Codling
articles.summary: Dyson has launched the Airwrap Co-anda2x, an upgraded version of its Airwrap multi-styler and dryer. Dyson claims that the new product has twice the air pressure for faster styling and offers versatile attachments for various hair types and styles. The Airwrap Co-anda2x is priced at £579.99 and is available in two color options.

articles.title: reMarkable Reveals Paper Pro Move: Its Latest ‘Better Than Paper' Digital Notebook
articles.author: David Phelan
articles.summary: reMarkable has launched a new color E-Ink digital notebook, featuring a 7.3-inch display and distraction-free writing experience. Available for order now, it costs $449 with the Marker or $499 with Marker Plus stylus and is designed to mimic pen on paper, with options for various writing styles. A Connect subscription is available for $2.99 a month, providing cloud storage, extra templates, and more.

articles.title: Andy's Pizza Soft Opened Their Newest Location!! Grand Opening This Weekend.
articles.author: Prince
articles.summary: Andy's Pizza soft opened a new location on Wisconsin Avenue in the former Baker's Daughter spot. To celebrate the grand opening this weekend, Andy's Pizza is offering a promotion: 'Buy any drink, get a slice on us, free pizza weekend!' at the Georgetown location.

articles.title: Locafy's AI Sales Team Delivers Strong Initial Results, Validating Scalable Go-to-Market Model
articles.summary: Locafy Limited launched its AI Sales Team, a new AI-driven service aimed at partner acquisition. The initial pilot campaign generated 18 meetings and 130 warm leads. Locafy's go-to-market strategy involves using AI to generate leads and connect them with partners to deliver Locafy's technology.

articles.title: How Falkirk shoppers can snap up a bargain at local store
articles.author: Ally Greenshields
articles.summary: Nisa High Station has launched a 99p five-item freshen up bundle in collaboration with Snappy Shopper. The bundle is available through home delivery only and includes toiletries like Radox Muscle Soak, Head & Shoulders Shampoo, and Colgate Toothpaste. Shoppers can order via Snappy Shopper and use the code NHSTATFREE for free delivery.

articles.title: On My Mind: Hot Dog Chips and Velvet Mary Janes
articles.author: Bella Druckman
articles.summary: The article details a search for the perfect natural deodorant, testing products from Wild, Malin + Goetz, Salt & Stone, and Nécessaire. The author also mentions other brands, including Evolvetogether and Ouai, which they are curious about. The brand Flabelus opened a new store in New York.

articles.title: Spare us men using 'lower body deodorants' – have they forgotten how to wash?
articles.author: Kate Lister
articles.summary: Lynx introduced 'Lower Body Spray' with advertising stunts. Sure launched 'Whole Body Deodorant', featuring adverts that list body parts you can use it on.

articles.title: Is MrBeast planning to start a phone company like Ryan Reynolds' Mint Mobile? Insider reports suggest yes
articles.author: Global Sports Desk
articles.summary: MrBeast's company, Beast Industries, is planning a new mobile service, potentially operating as an MVNO by leasing network access. The service might include perks like Feastables discounts and exclusive content, drawing parallels to Ryan Reynolds' success with Mint Mobile. The launch timeline is uncertain, but anticipation is high among fans.

articles.title: Emma Raducanu named global ambassador for personal care brand Wild
articles.author: Daniel Selwood
articles.summary: Wild unveiled its first refillable roll-on deodorant, available in four fragrances and four aluminium case designs. This New Product Development (NPD) was launched after Unilever acquired Wild in the spring. The company also signed Emma Raducanu as its first global ambassador to promote their products as part of the 'Champions of Change' campaign.

articles.title: Dyson launches new airwrap – and it surpasses all other hair tools
articles.author: Lucy Smith
articles.summary: Dyson launched the Airwrap Co-anda 2x in the UK on September 3rd. This new iteration of the popular Airwrap features more attachments and twice the air pressure compared to previous models, thanks to Dyson's fastest and most powerful motor. The product, priced at £579.99, claims to style hair with no heat damage and aims to offer salon-level results with improved efficiency.

articles.title: I tested OnePlus Pad Lite: Looking for a cheap tablet for the kids? This is it
articles.summary: OnePlus has launched the OnePlus Pad Lite, a budget-priced tablet costing €199. It features an 11-inch FHD+ LCD screen, a Mediatek G100 chip, 6GB of RAM, and OxygenOS 15 based on Android 15. It is available for purchase directly from OnePlus and Amazon.

articles.title: Lidl's Thermomix dupe hitting middle aisle TOMORROW and it's £1,050 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a multi-functional kitchen appliance and Thermomix alternative, for £299 for Lidl Plus customers and £399 for regular customers. The device features WiFi for recipe updates, guided video cooking, voice control via Google Assistant, and various cooking functions, and is available in Lidl GB stores.

articles.title: Lidl's Thermomix dupe hitting middle aisle TOMORROW and it's £1,050 cheaper than the original
articles.author: Maleeha Katib
articles.summary: Lidl is launching the Monsieur Cuisine Smart, a Thermomix alternative, for £299 for Lidl Plus customers or £399 for non-members. The kitchen appliance features multiple functionalities including cooking, steaming, kneading, and blending along with WiFi connectivity for recipe updates, guided video cooking, and voice control via Google Assistant.

articles.title: These 'Magic' Cleaning Gloves Make Washing Dishes Weirdly Satisfying — And They're $13
articles.author: Larry Stansbury
articles.summary: The article highlights several cleaning products. 'Magic' dishwashing gloves, crafted from food-grade silicone, feature built-in scrubbers and withstand high temperatures. Lestoil, originally a dry cleaning fluid, removes stains. Jubilee kitchen wax polishes surfaces and provides a protective wax finish. Bar Keepers Friend is a powder cleanser for grease and rust. Mrs. Stewart's Liquid Bluing is a bleach-free alternative for whitening fabrics. Fels-Naptha, a laundry bar, removes difficult stains. Borax is a multi-purpose cleaner. Fairy soap is a dishwashing liquid.

articles.title: The Fairphone 6 is an ethical Android phone that embarrasses its rivals
articles.author: Henry Burrell
articles.summary: Fairphone has launched the Fairphone 6, a modular Android smartphone priced from £499. The phone features replaceable parts, a five-year warranty, and eight years of software update support. A unique feature is the 'Moments mode' that simplifies the Android OS to minimize distractions. The Fairphone 6 prioritizes repairability and sustainability over premium build, offering user-replaceable parts at reasonable prices.

articles.title: Amazon Reveals Lens Live, Real-Time AI Visual Search in Shopping App
articles.author: Charles Mitchell
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, an AI-powered upgrade to Amazon Lens, that enables real-time product recognition via live camera streams. Users can instantly search for and purchase products by pointing their phone's camera at them. Lens Live incorporates Amazon SageMaker, Amazon OpenSearch, and Amazon's shopping assistant AI, Rufus, to provide quick product research and insights, initially targeting U.S. iOS users.

articles.title: Save $400 Off the Ultra Thin Samsung Galaxy S25 Edge Unlocked Smartphone, Down to the Lowest Price Ever
articles.author: Eric Song
articles.summary: Samsung's Galaxy S25 Edge is available on Amazon with a $400 discount. The 256GB model is priced at $699.99 and the 512GB model at $819.99, both in Titanium Icy Blue, Jet Black, or Silver. The Galaxy S25 Edge is a thinner version of the S25 Ultra with similar specifications.

articles.title: Faucet Buying Guide: Types, Features, Selection Tips and More!
articles.author: Neel Achary
articles.summary: The guide discusses various faucet types and their features to help in selection for different needs. Selecting Jaquar faucets ensures design, premium finishes and reliable performance in bathrooms and kitchens.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Tab S11: Leaks Reveal Specs & Design
articles.author: Sophie Lin
articles.summary: Samsung is preparing to launch the Galaxy Tab S11 series, emphasizing AI integration with features like 'Gemini Live' and an AI-powered 'Object Eraser.' The lineup will include a standard S11 and Ultra variant, with the Ultra model boasting a smaller notch, improved performance, and pricing starting at $1,200. Leaks indicate the Galaxy Tab S11 series will have starting price of $860 for the 256GB standard S11.

articles.title: Nutox Drops New Targeted Serum Range Made Just For Zillennials And It's Super Cute Too
articles.author: Gowri Chitra
articles.summary: Nutox, a Malaysian skincare brand, has launched the Nutox Targeted Serum Range designed for Zillennials, focusing on skinimalism with four serums addressing brightening, hydration, lifting, and soothing. The new line is available at 400 Guardian stores nationwide, targeting a younger, lifestyle-driven audience.

articles.title: 27 "Uncool" Products Under $25 That Will *Probably* Change Your Life
articles.author: Divinia Tarin
articles.summary: Monday Haircare introduces a dry shampoo that extends the life of freshly washed hair. PanOxyl releases a gentler acne creamy wash with acne-fighting ingredients. Liquid I.V. offers electrolyte drink mixes for hydration. JavaSok provides thermal sleeves to keep drinks cold, and a veggie chopper with multiple attachments is available for easy meal preparation.

articles.title: How Software Leaders Need To Adapt To AI — Or Risk Going Extinct.
articles.author: Bessemer Venture Partners
articles.summary: Canva has launched Magic Studio, Canva AI, and acquired MagicBrief, embedding AI tools into its platform to enhance design accessibility and functionality. Intercom transformed from a SaaS CRM into an AI leader with its AI agent, Fin, achieving $100 million ARR.  The article further notes that Enterprise giants are acquiring AI-native startups to reinvent their value propositions.

articles.title: 'Time saving' robot vacuum drops to £99 as shoppers wish they got one 'years ago'
articles.author: Eilidh Farquhar
articles.summary: Amazon is offering a renewed eufy G50 Robot Vacuum for £99. Amazon is also selling the Lefant M210P Robot Vacuum Cleaner for £109.99. Argos is offering the Shark PowerDetect Self-Empty Cordless Robot Vacuum Cleaner for £290. Argos also has the Apple Watch Ultra 2 on sale for £599.

articles.title: Samsung's Tri-Fold Phone To Launch In September? Here's What New Reports Say
articles.author: S Aadeetya
articles.summary: Samsung is rumored to launch its new tri-foldable device, Galaxy G Fold, in September, potentially making it available around November in select regions. The company is also expected to debut its XR headset, Project Moohan, and AR smart glasses. The price of the Galaxy G Fold is estimated around $3,000.

articles.title: Chinese automakers move up the value chain
articles.author: People Daily
articles.summary: A consumer considered upgrading their car and test-drove the Voyah FREE 318. The consumer was impressed by the smoothness and acceleration of the Voyah FREE 318 electric vehicle (EV).

articles.title: vivo V60 now in PH
articles.summary: Vivo launched the vivo V60 smartphone in the Philippines on September 3, 2025. The phone features ZEISS-powered telephoto portraits, a 6500mAh battery, smart AI features, and is available in Berry Purple, Summer Blue, and Mist Gray.

articles.title: Google Don Tease New Nest Gear We Don Dey Wait For!
articles.author: Oyinkansola Aderonke
articles.summary: Google is set to launch a new Nest Cam on October 1st, featuring upgrades like 2K camera support and integration with the 'Gemini' AI assistant, which aims to provide a more intelligent smart home experience. Additionally, Google is expected to introduce new, smaller smart speakers, comparable to the Amazon Echo Dot, as part of its expanding smart home ecosystem.

articles.title: Amazon Launches Lens Live: Shop Instantly by Scanning Items with Your Camera
articles.author: Kahekashan
articles.summary: Amazon launched Lens Live, a new feature within the Amazon Shopping app that utilizes AI to identify products through a smartphone camera and provide real-time shopping suggestions. The feature integrates with Rufus, Amazon's AI shopping assistant, to answer product-related queries, and it builds upon existing visual search tools with a continuous, live functionality.

articles.title: Scan and Shop Real-World Things With Amazon's New Lens Live
articles.author: Shiraz Aslam
articles.summary: Amazon launched News Lens, an AI-powered tool in its iOS Shopping app, allowing users to scan real-world objects with their phone cameras to shop for similar products instantly. Lens Live builds on Amazon Lens and it is paired with Rufus, Amazon's generative AI assistant, to summarize product details and suggest alternatives.

articles.title: Top Load Liquid Detergent: A Strategic Guide For Manufacturers, Suppli
articles.summary: Mayo World is presented as a global detergent manufacturer and exporter specializing in Top Load Liquid Detergent, providing solutions for OEM, private-label, and bulk supply. They offer scalable solutions, focusing on innovation, sustainability, and quality and position themselves as a partner for companies launching new product lines or upgrading their supply chains.

articles.title: Best stock pots
articles.author: Best Reviews
articles.summary: The All-Clad D5 Brushed Stainless Stock Pot features five-ply stainless steel and aluminum for even heat distribution and is available in sizes from 4 to 12 quarts. The Cuisinart Chef's Classic Stainless Steel Pasta/Steamer Set is a 12-quart stock pot with a drainer insert and steamer basket. The Farberware Classic Stainless Steel Stock Pot holds 16 quarts and is oven-safe up to 350 degrees.

articles.title: Subway now open on the Isle of Man two years after last stores shut
articles.summary: Subway is introducing a new iteration that promises the full global experience: freshly made-to-order subs, wraps, salads, bowls – and even 'loaded spuds'.

articles.title: Samsung launches Bespoke AI washer dryer range in India, prices start at ₹63990
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Bespoke AI Washer Dryer series in India, featuring a 12KG washer and 7KG dryer. The appliance includes AI Wash, Auto Dispense, and AI Energy mode. It is available at a starting price of Rs. 63,990 across Samsung.com, leading e-commerce platforms, and retail stores in India.

articles.title: Samsung Introduces Bespoke AI Washer Dryer Range In India
articles.author: BW Online Bureau
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Bespoke AI Washer Dryer range in India. This all-in-one washer dryer (12kg wash / 7kg dry) integrates intelligent fabric care with energy efficiency, offering features like AI Wash technology, Auto Dispense function, and AI Energy to reduce energy consumption. The new models are available at Samsung.com, e-commerce platforms, and retail outlets across India, with prices starting at Rs 63,990.

articles.title: This ultraportable Lenovo is one of my favorite laptops for remote work - here's why
articles.author: ZDNet
articles.summary: Lenovo's Yoga Slim 7x features fast performance, long battery life, and an OLED display. The product stands out due to its value proposition.

articles.title: Acer Debuts the New Swift Air 16 - Ultralight Copilot+ PC for Modern Mobile Professionals
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: The Swift family introduced a new 16-inch display laptop. The new laptop has powerful AI performance in a sleek sub-1 kg chassis.

articles.title: Just 32 Travel Products To Buy *Now* So You're Prepared For All Your Trips *Later*
articles.author: Amber Usher
articles.summary: Adidas is highlighted for its Cloudfoam sneakers, known for their comfort. Apple's AirTag is featured as a device for tracking luggage using the 'Find My' app.

articles.title: Aldi's £4.99 buy instantly transforms your clothes – it will save you hundreds on a new autumn wardrobe
articles.author: Roisin Chapman
articles.summary: Aldi is launching a Rechargheable Lint Shaver for £4.99 on September 4th. The lint shaver, designed to revive clothes, features a removable storage container, cleaning brush, and a USB charging cable. It comes in light or dark blue with a three-year warranty.

articles.title: Unstoppable Domains and 0G Foundation Announce .AGI, the Naming Standard for the Intelligent Internet
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Unstoppable Domains and 0G Foundation are launching .AGI, a new top-level domain for the artificial general intelligence sector. The .AGI pre-sale is now live, with on-chain minting expected in Q1 2026 on the 0G blockchain. This new domain will offer functionalities like on-chain websites, crypto payments, and encrypted messaging.

articles.title: Jason's Sourdough extends beyond bread with foray into crumpets
articles.author: Helen Gilbert
articles.summary: Jason's Sourdough has launched Proper Sourdough Crumpets, made with flour, water, salt and fermented wheat flour, available in 700 Tesco stores. This new product expands Jason's Sourdough's offerings beyond bread, catering to demand for premium bakery products with simple ingredients.

articles.title: SMSFAST Launches Innovative Temporary Phone Number Service, Introduces Industry-First Deliverability Scores
articles.author: Plentisoft
articles.summary: SMSFAST launched a new global platform for temporary phone numbers, introducing deliverability scores. This feature aims to solve issues with disposable numbers and failed verification messages, allowing users to filter numbers based on historical success rates. The service offers Rent-a-Number and Activation Model options for purchasing temporary numbers.

articles.title: 刚刚，谷歌放出Nano Banana六大正宗Prompt玩法，手残党速来_手机网易网
articles.author: 机器之心Pro
org: 谷歌强调，这些指令可以最大限度的发挥
articles.summary: Google has released six text-to-image prompts for its Nano Banana model. These prompts guide users in generating photorealistic images, stylized illustrations, images with text, product mockups, minimalist designs, and continuous art. Nano Banana allows for image editing, style transfer, and iterative optimization through text prompts.

articles.title: 'Prime Day for pre-loved': Amazon launches discount event for used and refurbished products
articles.summary: Amazon launched its first sales event for used, returned, and refurbished items. This initiative aims to reduce waste and extend the lifecycle of products sold on its platform.

articles.title: 刚刚，谷歌放出Nano Banana六大正宗Prompt玩法，手残党速来
org: 谷歌强调，这些指令可以最大限度的发挥
articles.summary: Google has released six text-to-image prompts for its Nano Banana model, which allows users to generate high-quality images from text descriptions. Nano Banana can perform image editing, multi-image composition, style transfer, and text rendering. The prompts provided by Google aim to maximize the model's image generation capabilities.

articles.title: Amazon Brings 'Lens Live' to Shopping App: Here is How to Use It
articles.author: Priya Pathak
articles.summary: Amazon has launched 'Lens Live,' a new visual search feature in its Shopping app, allowing customers to identify items with their phone's camera and find matching products on Amazon. The feature uses AI and computer vision to recognize objects and connects with Amazon's AI shopping assistant, Rufus, to provide product summaries and answer questions.

articles.title: Is Dollar Store Tech All Junk? I Bought 10 Gadgets to Find Out
articles.author: John Carlsen
articles.summary: The article reviews budget tech gadgets, including the Winner's Circle Vacuum Cleaner and Bytech Wi-Fi Smart RGB Bulb, found at dollar stores. The Winner's Circle vacuum is a functional product, whereas the Bytech Wi-Fi Smart RGB Bulb makes for an affordable gift.

articles.title: Transform Your Laundry Routine With These 14 Items
articles.author: Tessa Flores
articles.summary: DedCool launched Dedtergent in Xtra Milk, a non-toxic detergent with amber, bergamot and white musk scent. Tyler Candle Company released Glamorous Wash laundry soap with floral and fruity scent, which went viral on TikTok. Persil introduced a German-made professional-grade detergent powder available on Amazon that keeps colored clothes looking crisp and fresh.

articles.title: Volkswagen Tiguan and Tayron PHEVs confirmed for Australia
articles.author: Damion Smy
articles.summary: Volkswagen is considering introducing multiple model grades of Tiguan and Tayron in Australia. The company is focusing on tailoring the right product package and timing for Australian customers based on their experience in overseas markets.

articles.title: Amazon's New Lens Live Lets You Scan Anything Around You and Shop It Instantly With AI
articles.author: Jose Enrico
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, an AI-powered tool that allows users to identify objects with their phone's camera and instantly find and purchase them on Amazon. This new feature incorporates advanced generative AI to better identify objects and match them to items in Amazon's marketplace in real-time, providing a swipeable carousel of related items for comparison.

articles.title: Amazon launches 'Lens Live' an AI-powered visual search for real-time shopping
articles.author: TOI Tech Desk
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, a new AI-powered feature integrated into the Amazon Shopping app that allows users to instantly identify and shop for products seen in the real world. This feature combines real-time visual search with Amazon's AI assistant, Rufus, and is currently available for iOS users in the US, with plans for expansion.

articles.title: Disclaimer: You Might Become A Bit Obsessed With These 44 Products
articles.author: Gabriela Manjarrez
articles.summary: This article highlights the features and benefits of various new products. Products includes Kojic Acid Dark Spot Remover Soap, Liquid I.V. Hydration packets, Anua Heartleaf Pore Control Cleansing Oil, Bio-Oil, and TBH too nice Tineco 2-in-1 cordless vacuum and mop.

articles.title: Amazon now lets you shop by scanning real-world items
articles.summary: Amazon has launched Lens Live, a new AI feature integrated into the Amazon shopping app. This tool allows users to instantly identify and shop for goods seen in the real world by combining visual search with Amazon's AI assistant, Rufus. Lens Live offers features like quick comparisons, direct addition to cart, wishlist saving, suggested questions, and summaries to improve online shopping experiences.

articles.title: Step into the Future of Showering: Where Elegance Meets Efficiency
articles.author: SAT Articles
articles.summary: AXOR has launched AXOR ShowerSphere, a new shower program designed by Antonio Citterio. The product features an elliptical design, Flexpower technology for water efficiency, and multiple spray modes. It offers a variety of shower solutions including wall-mounted and ceiling-mounted options with adjustable shower arms.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Tri Fold will likely debut on…
articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung is expected to launch its first tri-fold phone, the Galaxy Z Tri Fold, in September. The initial launch will be in selected markets.

articles.title: Porsche 911 Turbo returns in hybrid guise on September 7
articles.summary: Porsche is preparing to unveil updated 911 Turbo and Turbo S models on September 7, which will feature an advanced hybrid powertrain. The updated Turbo S model is expected to generate over 700hp, a significant increase from the previous 640hp. These new models are likely to have a hybridized version and the standard version is expected to exceed the 600hp mark.

articles.title: 농심, 한정판 완판 후 소비자 요청 봉지면 ‘새우탕면' 출시
articles.summary: Nongshim is launching 'Shrimp Tangmyeon' packaged noodles on the 15th, an enhanced version of its 'Shrimp Tang Big Bowl Noodle' featuring a deeper seafood flavor and added shrimp powder. This official release follows a successful limited edition launch in February where the product sold out within two weeks.

articles.title: Galaxy Tab S10 Lite: A Value-Packed Tablet for Everyday Needs
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd. introduced the Galaxy Tab S10 Lite, an affordable tablet. This new device aims to enhance user experiences in watching content, creating, and maintaining productivity on the go.

articles.title: The iPhone's 'boring' era officially ends next week
articles.author: Ryan Christoffel
articles.summary: Apple's upcoming iPhone 17 launch is expected to introduce significant design innovations, marking a departure from recent stagnant hardware redesigns in previous models like the iPhone 16 and iPhone 15. This launch is anticipated to bring renewed excitement and optimism to the iPhone product line.

articles.title: OpenAI Acquires Statsig to Enhance Experimentation and App Development Capabilities
articles.author: Daniel Foster
articles.summary: OpenAI acquired Statsig to integrate its feature flagging and experimentation platform to enhance experimentation and app progress capabilities. This integration will allow for A/B testing of different prompts, dynamic adjustment of image generation model parameters and streamlined app development. Ultimately, this will help developers and businesses leverage AI and provide faster time to market and improved user engagement.

articles.title: Amazon rolls out Lens Live feature, lets you shop by scanning items with your camera
articles.summary: Amazon has introduced Lens Live, a new feature that turns smartphone cameras into shopping catalogues by allowing users to point their cameras at objects to instantly find product listings on Amazon's marketplace. Lens Live uses Amazon's AI to identify objects in real-time and provides a swipeable carousel with add-to-cart and wishlist buttons, and also taps into Rufus, Amazon's AI shopping assistant, to help users to make sense of the listings.

articles.title: Xiaomi launches Redmi 15 and Redmi 15C in Nepal
articles.author: THT Online
articles.summary: Xiaomi has launched two new smartphones, Redmi 15 and Redmi 15C, in Nepal. The Redmi 15 features a 7,000mAh battery, 6.9-inch FHD+ display, Snapdragon 685 processor, and a 50MP AI dual camera, with prices starting at Rs. 18,999. The Redmi 15C includes a 6,000mAh battery, 6.9-inch HD+ display, MediaTek Helio G81-Ultra processor, and a 50MP AI dual camera, with prices starting at Rs. 14,999.

articles.title: Samsung Galaxy A17 5G Launched as Most Affordable AI Smartphone: Starts at Rs 18999
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Galaxy A17 5G, its most affordable Galaxy A series AI smartphone, in India. This new device is now available across major retail outlets, Samsung Exclusive Stores, Samsung.com, and other online platforms.

articles.title: Domino's Pizza's new product, "Lobster Shrimp Toowoomba Pizza," sold more than 600,000 copies within..
articles.author: Kim Si-Kyun
articles.summary: Domino's Pizza launched the 'Lobster Shrimp Toowoomba Pizza' to celebrate its 35th anniversary in Korea. The new pizza sold over 600,000 units within two months of launch, and is popular among the MZ generation, with 62% of purchasers from that demographic. Domino's Pizza plans to introduce more products that will satisfy consumers.

articles.title: Starbucks To Launch Protein-Packed Cold Foam, Lattes Later This Month
articles.author: CNBC.com
articles.summary: Starbucks is launching protein-packed cold foam and lattes on September 29th to capitalize on the increasing consumer demand for protein-rich options. The protein cold foam, available in various flavors, will add 19 to 26 grams of protein to a grande beverage, while the protein latte will deliver 27 to 36 grams of protein in a grande size.

articles.title: How India's GCCs are driving global reinvention
articles.author: Akhil George
articles.summary: NatWest India has implemented over 100 AI use cases, including the Cora Plus chatbot handling millions of customer conversations. Microsoft's Indian operations developed AI-powered features for Word, Excel, and PowerPoint. NAB Innovation Centre India leverages talent diversity to solve global challenges, developing products for Australia's multicultural population.

articles.title: Get prata, ramen and Michelin-recognised food from this vending machine, Lifestyle News
articles.summary: Aikit is launching ChefGenie, an AI-powered automated kitchen solution that dispenses freshly cooked food from eight brands. This pilot program begins September 9th at Punggol Digital District, offering 4,000 meals for $1.99 from ChefGenie-powered machines from September 9-14.

articles.title: Dalton Maag Challenges OEM Font Status Quo with MetricsMatch
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dalton Maag launched MetricsMatch, a font solution for OEMs that offers a cost-effective alternative to industry-standard font sets. MetricsMatch includes five initial font sets and promises transparent pricing, fair licensing, and customization options. Resident font sets for printer imaging are scheduled for release in 2026.

articles.title: 谷歌nano banana官方最强Prompt模板来了！先收藏再说
articles.summary: Google is introducing Prompt templates for its Gemini 2.5 Flash Image (nano banana) to aid users in generating high-quality images. These templates cover various scenarios, including realistic photography, sticker creation, text rendering, and product photography, and are intended to simplify the image generation process. The article provides specific examples of the use of the templates.

articles.title: Omnissa Is Named a Leader for the Third Consecutive Year in the 2025 Gartner Magic Quadrant for Desktop as a Service
articles.author: Media Contact
articles.summary: Omnissa's Horizon Cloud, a solution for delivering secure virtual desktops and applications, has been recognized as a Leader in the Gartner Magic Quadrant for the third consecutive year. This reflects Omnissa's focus on innovation and enhancing the employee experience through solutions that reduce desktop management costs and effort. Horizon Cloud enables secure access to desktops and applications from any device or browser, with deployment options across various cloud environments.

articles.title: How I Made My First N10m ' Toke Makinwa
articles.author: Latestnigeriannews
articles.summary: Toke Makinwa Luxury brand made its first 10 million naira in sales in 2020. The brand sells luxury bags, costing 300,000 naira.

articles.title: SMSFAST Launches Innovative Temporary Phone Number Service, Introduces Industry-First Deliverability Scores
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: SMSFAST introduced a new global platform for temporary phone numbers that offers secure and accessible solutions. This service includes a novel feature called deliverability scores to improve online verification and privacy protection.

articles.title: LG Electronics to launch new air system R&D center in 2027
articles.author: Yonhap News
articles.summary: LG Electronics plans to launch a new product or service. This announcement occurred on Wednesday, September 3rd, in Seoul.

articles.title: OptAI to Showcase the Future of On-Device AI at IFA 2025
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: OptAI will unveil its latest AI optimization solutions powered by Opt-Hancer at IFA 2025. The company will present solutions developed through Opt-Hancer, including optimization of LG EXAONE 3.5, and demonstrate its capabilities across large language models and vision models on Qualcomm Snapdragon chipsets. OptAI aims to showcase cross-platform optimization and share its vision for on-device AI.

articles.title: OptAI to Showcase the Future of On-Device AI at IFA 2025
articles.author: Opt AI Inc
articles.summary: OptAI will unveil its latest AI optimization solutions powered by Opt-Hancer. The company's participation in Pitch Battle and DreamStage highlights its global expansion strategy and "Any Model, Any Device" vision.

articles.title: NH Nonghyup Bank announced on the 3rd that it will hold an event to join the artificial intelligence..
articles.author: A Proposal
articles.summary: NH Nonghyup Bank is holding an event from April 4th to 31st to promote their "NH Robo Dream," an AI-based fund portfolio recommendation service. New subscribers to a fund portfolio through the NH Smart Banking or All One Bank app, who also register for automatic transfers of more than 100,000 won per month for over 12 months, can receive Naver Pay points and participate in a lottery to win a Samsung Bespoke AI system cleaner or Galaxy Buds 3 Pro.

articles.title: Meta Will Enable You to Exclude Terms from AI Copy Generations
articles.author: Andrew Hutchinson
articles.summary: Meta has launched a new 'Restricted Words' option within its Advantage+ campaign setup. This feature allows marketers to exclude specific words from AI-generated ad copy, providing greater control over branding in AI-based promotions.

articles.title: Why Labubu craze is just the start of China's branding boom
articles.author: Chris Pereira
articles.summary: Xiaomi launched its car and delivered more than 300,000 vehicles within 15 months. CATL is expanding its presence and holds roughly 38 per cent of the global electric vehicle (EV) battery market.

articles.title: New Social Listening Tool with Sentiment Analysis Launched by BrandMentions - Leading Social Media Monitoring Platform with Entity-Level Sentiment Scoring
articles.author: Brand Mentions
articles.summary: BrandMentions launched a new Advanced Sentiment Analysis and Emotion Detection feature. This new feature introduces per-entity sentiment scoring that precisely measures consumer feelings toward specific brands, products, or hashtags within complex online conversations. The new sentiment analysis features are available immediately to all BrandMentions users across all pricing tiers.

articles.title: Lahore Developer Unveils AI-Powered Tool to Reinvent the 'About Us' Page
articles.author: Getnews
articles.summary: Kashif Mukhtar, a Lahore-based developer, has launched BrandVoice AI Forge, a new AI-powered tool designed to generate personalized 'About Us' pages for businesses, entrepreneurs, and freelancers. The tool guides users through identity details, brand story, and contact information to create styled HTML content that can be copied or exported.

articles.title: Mentos rolls out Mentos Cube with ‘Bite Me' campaign, via The Idea Shed
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Mentos Australia launched Mentos Cube, a gum product, with a campaign by The Idea Shed. Mentos Cube features a distinctive cube shape, vibrant packaging and intense flavour, targeting Gen Z. The multi-channel rollout includes OOH, print, digital, social, in-store and experiential activations.

articles.title: Microsoft and Asus are changing what handheld gaming means with the ROG Xbox Ally
articles.author: John Kanellakos
articles.summary: Asus and Microsoft have launched the ROG Xbox Ally series, a new line of handheld gaming PCs. This collaboration features software optimizations for mobile PC gaming, aiming for a console-like experience. The devices are set to launch on October 16, and showcase Windows 11's new gaming mode.

articles.title: Yakult Mexico to Start Selling Yakult Muscat Flavor (Yakult Honsha Co Ltd)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Yakult Honsha Co., Ltd. announced that Yakult Mexico will start selling Yakult Muscat Flavor on September 1, 2025. This introduction of a new flavor expands Yakult's product line in the Mexican market.

articles.title: Make Your Dutch Run® Even Sweeter with Order Ahead (Dutch Bros Inc)
articles.author: Public Technologies
articles.summary: Dutch Bros introduced Order Ahead, a new feature in their app, providing customers with a fast and easy way to order drinks and pick them up at local shops.

articles.title: What Should You Upgrade First in Cronos: The New Dawn?

articles.summary: Cronos: The New Dawn, a survival horror game, introduces players to dangerous scenarios with limited resources. The game presents a new direction within the survival horror genre.

articles.summary: Amazon launched Lens Live, a new service providing real-time visual shopping on mobile phones.

articles.summary: Hollow Knight: Silksong will natively support ultrawide monitors. This feature was absent in its predecessor, Hollow Knight.

articles.author: Hindustan Times
articles.summary: Samsung has launched its new Bespoke AI Washer Dryer series in India. This integrated 12KG washer and 7KG dryer model targets the growing demand for all-weather laundry solutions in urban households.

articles.author: Rio Grande Sun
articles.summary: Outdoo's rebrand emphasizes its dedication to addressing revenue challenges through AI-powered roleplay, coaching, and business intelligence. This rebrand likely signifies an update or enhancement of Outdoo's service offerings focused on leveraging AI to improve revenue outcomes for its clients.

articles.summary: LG's FURON AI Agent powers the company's smart home AI ambitions, aiming for ambient computing where technology anticipates user needs seamlessly, like lights turning on automatically.

articles.summary: Digitel's BSS platform support renewal enhances its capabilities to scale, innovate, and deliver 5G-powered customer experiences. The renewal aims to strengthen Digitel's service delivery in the 5G domain.

articles.summary: Silksong is launching soon. Details include its release time and coverage of early impressions.

articles.author: Metro UK
articles.summary: A new version of the PS5 console has been leaked. This suggests an updated model or iteration of the Sony PlayStation 5 is upcoming.

articles.summary: McDonald's introduced a new special edition sauce. This sauce can be added to four different chicken menu items, including the new snack wrap.
